articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo signs with Saudi Arabia's Al Nassr club
articles.description: The move will likely fuel the debate about Saudi Arabia using “sportswashing” to boost its image internationally
articles.content:
Saudi Arabian soccer club Al Nassr announced Friday that it has signed superstar Cristiano Ronaldo.
Why it matters: The move will likely fuel the debate about Saudi Arabia using sportswashing to boo… [+995 chars]

articles.author: David PurdumESPN Staff Writer
articles.title: New Jersey halts Citrus Bowl betting; Purdue's Drew Brees in violation of regulations, sources said
articles.description: New Jersey halted the state's sportsbooks from taking bets on the Citrus Bowl due to Drew Brees' prior involvement with PointsBet and his recent hire onto Purdue's coaching staff, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: New Jersey gaming regulators on Friday ordered sportsbooks to halt betting on the Citrus Bowl between Purdue and LSU, because "an individual associated with Purdue Football team" is in violation of s… [+1988 chars]
